definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: I can’t stand all that emotional nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 我可受不了那些拿肉麻当有趣的无聊举动。

sentences.english: She slobbering all over her boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 她对男朋友肉麻地示爱。

sentences.english: No lowly shameless nauseating and absurd remarks of praise or flattery.
sentences.chinese: 没有卑贱无耻肉麻的赞美或奉承而荒谬言论。

sentences.english: Causing this, nauseating feeling inside my gut.
sentences.chinese: 造成这种肉麻我的直觉里面。

sentences.english: Can't deny what I say a trifle and disgusting, but wear is all my heartfelt words.
sentences.chinese: 不可否认我说的有点肉麻，但着都是我的肺腑之言。

definition: (of a couple) to be sweet to each other/lovey-dovey/variant of 膩味|腻味[ni4 wei5]
to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
